backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with shop, item, search, photo‑attachment logic and initialization routines.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a new clothing item to a specific shop during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a requirement to add a static image for a newly seeded clothing item.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and main script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with root, category, search, and results routes.
frontend/src/components/aura/AppLayout.t: App layout with header, footer, and backend shop initialization on mount.
frontend/src/components/aura/ItemCard.ts: Displays a clothing item card with image, category, details, and shop availability count.
frontend/src/components/aura/ItemDetailD: Dialog showing item details, shop list, and photo upload functionality with live preview.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuraQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list categories, search items, fetch item details and shop counts, and upload item photos via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context and provider handling auth client setup, identity loading, login, logout, and login status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CategorySelectionPage: Displays selectable fashion categories with icons and navigates to the search page on selection.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Runs item searches based on filters, shows results or errors, and supports viewing item details.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Provides a form for entering item-type, color, and pattern filters and navigates to the results page.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Normalizes photo paths, ensuring proper formatting for URLs and local asset references.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, issues, and requirements for building the AURA fashion discovery app with Bangalore shop data and item photos.
